typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Filename as string ('sales_2019.csv')
}
source(output(
		p_id as short,
		c_id as short,
		no_of_units as short,
		date_purchased as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($Filename)]) ~> SalesFile
SalesFile sink(input(
		p_id as integer,
		c_id as integer,
		no_of_units as integer,
		date_purchased as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		p_id,
		c_id,
		no_of_units,
		date_purchased
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SalesTable
